rules_text:
When Unknowable Starspawn enters, target opponent chooses two –
• You gain 4 life and that opponent loses 4 life.
• That opponent sacrifices a creature.
• That opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: [i]The stars welcome the deposement of liches, and seek to aid Scratch in his endeavor.[/i]
notes:
When Unknowable Starspawn enters the battlefield, each opponent chooses two —
• Unknowable Starspawn's controller gains 4 life and you lose 4 life.
• Sacrifice a creature.
• Discard a card.

When Unknowable Starspawn enters the battlefield, each opponent chooses two. The same mode may be chosen by multiple players.
• You gain 4 life and the player who chose this mode loses 4 life.
• The player who chose this mode sacrifices a creature.
• The player who chose this mode discards a card.

When Unknowable Starspawn enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 4 life unless they sacrifice a creature or discard a card. Repeat this process once. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
